headers.subject: [tosdr:2113] [good?] Tumblr doesn't store your financial information

html:
We do not, however, store that financial information; such information is stored by our third party payment processor (the "Payment Processor"), and use and storage of that information is governed by the Payment Processor’s applicable terms of service and privacy policy (the Payment Processor may also have other terms, and you are responsible for locating and familiarizing yourself with those terms, as applicable).

http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/privacy

However, their third party payment processor does... 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [good?] Tumblr doesn't store your financial information
text:
>
> We do not, however, store that financial information; such information is 
> stored by our third party payment processor (the "*Payment Processor*"), 
> and use and storage of that information is governed by the Payment 
> Processor’s applicable terms of service<http://www.authorize.net/company/terms/>
>  and privacy policy <http://www.authorize.net/company/privacy/> (the 
> Payment Processor may also have other terms, and you are responsible for 
> locating and familiarizing yourself with those terms, as applicable).


http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/privacy

However, their third party payment processor does...
